title: Identify Schedule Float
description: A PM needs to identify which upcoming tasks have float (can be delayed without affecting the project completion date) to allow for resource reallocation.

tasks.description: Run a critical path analysis on the project schedule.
Generate a report of all tasks not on the critical path, sorted by the amount of total float.
tasks.expected_outcome: A report is generated, showing 'Landscaping' has 15 days of float.
